TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Kbaqeh, title = Kbaqeh, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kbaqeh} }

S.FORM: == Kbaqeh == u sulit nu Hulam: 那羅一部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kbaqeh. u kasalumaluma' nu Kbaqeh sa, 34 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 109 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 90 ku tademaw, pakalatu 83%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 19 ku tademaw, pakalatu 17%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 77%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 2%, zumazuma 4%. u Tayan(Tayal) a niyazu' u Tayan(Tayal) a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah(Amis), u Yuwatan(Bunun), u Taluku(Truku), inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 9 a bulad pulung sausi (564,120), Pangcah (210,501), Tayan (90,631), Paywan (101,234), Yuwatan (58,711), Rukay (13,368), Puyuma (14,279), Cou (6,653), Saysiat (6,644), Yami (4,620), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,477), Taluku (31,689), Sakizaya (947), Sejek (10,115), Laaluwa (403), Kanakanabu (340), zuma (11,716) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 10 a bulad pulung sausi (564,603), Pangcah (210,658), Tayan (90,719), Paywan (101,346), Yuwatan (58,759), Rukay (13,373), Puyuma (14,303), Cou (6,659), Saysiat (6,648), Yami (4,625), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,478), Taluku (31,742), Sakizaya (952), Sejek (10,132), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (342), zuma (11,670)

== Kbaqeh == o solit no Holam: 那羅一部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kbaqeh. o kasalomaloma' no Kbaqeh sa, 34 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 109 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 90 ko tademaw, pakalato 83%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 19 ko tademaw, pakalato 17%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 77%, Yowatan(Bonon) 2%, zomazoma 4%. o Tayan(Tayal) a niyazo' o Tayan(Tayal) a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah(Amis), o Yowatan(Bonon), o Taloko(Troko), inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 9 a bolad polong saosi (564,120), Pangcah (210,501), Tayan (90,631), Paywan (101,234), Yowatan (58,711), Rokay (13,368), Poyoma (14,279), Coo (6,653), Saysiat (6,644), Yami (4,620), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,477), Taloko (31,689), Sakizaya (947), Sejek (10,115), Laalowa (403), Kanakanabo (340), zoma (11,716) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 10 a bolad polong saosi (564,603), Pangcah (210,658), Tayan (90,719), Paywan (101,346), Yowatan (58,759), Rokay (13,373), Poyoma (14,303), Coo (6,659), Saysiat (6,648), Yami (4,625), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,478), Taloko (31,742), Sakizaya (952), Sejek (10,132), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (342), zoma (11,670)
